short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds button to launch Overlay-Player. (Having Overlay-Player installed is required)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlay-Player is an application which lets you play YouTube and Twitch videos and streams above other programs. This extensions launches the application on your computer.
